C

calculateScoreForEachPlayer() - Method in class it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.Model.Player
if damage of this player is 11 or 12 returns a hash map with key color of player and value the score that he obtained doing damage to this player and it frees player's board It consider also the first blood but not the mark of revenge and the double kills Else it launch exceptions if No Possible calculate Score Requires : the number of player must be max 5 like written in the instruction set
